Rainy_Day_0: Hey babe. Don't you love the sound of rain?$1

Rainy_Day_3: Good morning! How are you doing babe?$1#$e#I always wake up better next to you...$4
Rainy_Day_4: I still wake up angry sometimes...$7#$b#But waking up next to you makes it better.$4

Indoor_Day_0: Babe, I'm gonna stay here for a bit.$1#$e#What are you up to?$6
Indoor_Day_1: BABE! I made breakfast.[457]$6#$b#What. We had weird stuff in the fridge.$1
Indoor_Day_2: I finished breakfast already. I hope you didn't want anything.$7
Indoor_Day_3: I think I'm going to play some tunes and melt into the carpet today.$1#$e#Unless you have other plans babe.$4

Indoor_Night_0: Hey babe. You in for the night?$1#$b#I miss your presence.$1
Indoor_Night_1: *wild humming*$10#$b#Oh! You're back. I missed you.$6
Indoor_Night_2: Hungry? I braved the supermart for you![728]$1
Indoor_Night_3: If you're headed out tonight, make sure you're back before too long.#$b#I do not want to deal with some stranger bringing you home$3#$e#And I worry about you too.$7
Indoor_Night_4: How was your day babe?#$b#Mine was quiet as per usual.$1

Outdoor_1: The most lovely thing out here is you babe.$4#$b#I'm gonna take a nap later. This fresh air is making me sleepy.$7
Outdoor_2: I think today is going to be good.$1
Outdoor_3: I did NOT wake up well.$5#$b#So I came out here to cool off...$2
Outdoor_4: Hmmmm... Waking up with the sun isn't my favorite of your ideas...$2#$b#But at least I get to see you in the sunlight.$6

Good_6: I love waking up next to you.$9

funLeave_AlexandriaFS: Babe! I'm headed out for a bit. Try not to die in the mines while I'm gone ok?$1
funReturn_AlexandriaFS: I'm back! Did you miss me?$1
spring_2: Spring is here again. Got any big plans for the farm?$1#$e#I'd much rather you spent the day with me...$4

spring_22: Do you have any allergies? I know some people sneeze like crazy around this time of year.$1
summer_20: I do not like the sun. I burn waaay too easy.$1

fall_25: Somedays, I want to disappear into a pile of leaves... But they are often damp.$7
